QuestData.Title: Stomp To My Beat
QuestData.Description: Our warriors are out there fightin' hard to kill them nasty Wildhammer dwarves, so we can be safe back here at the village. It's only right we do what we can to support them.$B$BA good beat's what every troll needs to do his best in a fight. The poundin' rhythm of the drums drivin' you to hit harder, callin' the spirits to watch over you. Take my drums to the battlefield wit' ya. Play 'em for our warriors, and let 'em show the Wildhammer who owns these lands!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Revantusk War Drums on 6 Revantusk Warriors.
QuestData.CompletionText: Back so soon? Don't be shy, now.
QuestData.RewardText: Makes all the difference, doesn't it? That'll teach those dwarves a lesson.
